title: Bike To Work
desc: Use your bike to get to work

title: Pick Up Trash
desc: Pick up some trash you find outside

title: Recycle
desc: Bring your trash to a recycle station

title: Public Transport
desc: Use public transport instead of a car

title: Meal Plan
desc: Make a meal plan to fight food waste

title: Eat more vegetables
desc: Include vegetables instead of meat in your diet

title: Cold Shower
desc: Take a shorter, cold shower than usual

title: Save Electricity
desc: Unplug devices currently not in use instead of leaving them in standby
